conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.209-6, Protecting the Governmentâ€™s Interests when Subcontracting with Contractors Debarred, Suspended, or Proposed for Debarment, in solicitations and contracts where the contract value exceeds $35,000.
